title: new runes
body:
i've been playing this game ever since ~s2 and it has been a good exp playing until this season really.. these frequent constant changes that the developers think are necessary have always been completely unwanted, especially when they removed the awesome runes.. 

i had ~14 rune pages, some were for fun like, crit dmg, crit chance, cdr, healing and other cool combinations.. and now i have a useless pile of ip that i don't even know how to spend; emojis are completely useless.. idk what these developers are thinking.. 

this game has been amazing until this season.. i miss the old game developers.. i am really sick of these stupid changes; i don't want to keep learning and reading new changes over and over.. i simply wanted to play with friends.. 

i think the developers did a damn good job killing league for old players... and giving them emojis in return.. it's like communism i can't believe it..
sadly wont play ranked ever again with this stupid system in place.. will play other old school games that are still cool.. it's such a shame:/

i never posted anything on the forum before.. this game is going in the wrong direction

#wtfdevelopers 
#newrunes 
#stupidnewrunes
#stupidchanges
#freetyler1

replies.body:
What the hell does communism have to do with fun interactive abilities instead of the same 3 flat stat boosts for every single champion?

Name one champ that did not run AP/mpen/armor/mr or AD(AS)/apen/armor/mr.

Also fuck tyler1.
New runes are more fun and interesting than old runes, old IP is basically the same as new BE, Tyler1 should stay banned.
